blogPost.excerpt: Thunder Client is Rest API Client Extension for Visual Studio Code, with simple and clean design. The extension makes api testing very easy with Scriptless GUI based testing.
blogPost.body: Thunder Client is Rest API Client Extension for Visual Studio Code, with simple and clean design. The extension makes api testing very easy with Scriptless GUI based testing.
blogPost.title: Thunder Client - Rest API client for VS Code, lightweight Postman alternative
blogPost.author: Ranga Vadhineni

localize.description: 雷霆客户端是Visual Studio代码的Rest API客户端扩展，设计简洁明了。该扩展通过基于脚本的GUI测试使api测试变得非常容易。
localize.tagline: VS Code的Rest API客户端，轻量级的Postman替代方案。

localize.description: 雷霆客戶端是Visual Studio代碼的Rest API客戶端擴展，設計簡潔明瞭。該擴展通過基於腳本的GUI測試使api測試變得非常容易。
localize.tagline: VS Code的Rest API客戶端，輕量級的Postman替代方案。

next.excerpt: Stack is an experimental product from Google's internal incubator Area 120 which makes it easy to scan and organize your documents. It uses Google Cloud's Document AI to understand the meaning of the documents you scan, or upload from your camera roll.
next.title: Stack by Area 120 at Google - All your documents, organized with Google's document AI

localize.description: Stack是谷歌内部孵化器Area 120的一款实验性产品，它可以让你轻松扫描和整理文件。它使用谷歌云的文档AI来理解你扫描的文档，或者从你的相机卷上传的文档的含义。
localize.tagline: 你的所有文件，用谷歌的文档AI来组织。

localize.description: Stack是谷歌內部孵化器Area 120的一款實驗性產品，它可以讓你輕鬆掃描和整理文件。它使用谷歌雲的文檔AI來理解你掃描的文檔，或者從你的相機捲上傳的文檔的含義。
localize.tagline: 你的所有文件，用谷歌的文檔AI來組織。
